WizardTD

Class Mana

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Mana

  • public class Mana
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mana(float amount, float cap, processing.core.PApplet app, float cost, float increasePerUse, float capMultiplier)
      Constructor called whenever Mana object is created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(float amt)
      Adds to the current amount depending on the float value passed.
      void decrease(float amt)
      Decreases the current amount depending on the float value passed.
      void display()
      Displays mana bar using 2 rectangles on top of each other, scaled using current amount / maximum amount.
      float getCost()
      Returns the value of the current cost calculated by adding cost and upgrade count multiplied by increase per use amount.

      Returns value of the current amount of mana.
      int getUpgradeCt()
      Returns the value of the upgrade count.
      void manaSpell()
      If the current amount - the cost of the spell is less than 0, function does nothing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mana

        public Mana(float amount,
            float cap,
            processing.core.PApplet app,
            float cost,
            float increasePerUse,
            float capMultiplier)
        Constructor called whenever Mana object is created.
        Parameters:
        amount - float indicating current mana.
        cap - float indicating max mana.
        app - a reference of PApplet passed to allow this class to call relevant drawing functions.
        cost - float indicating cost of manaspell.
        increasePerUse - float indicating how much to increase cost by according to how many times upgraded.
        capMultiplier - float to multiply cap by whenever manaspell used.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display()
        Displays mana bar using 2 rectangles on top of each other, scaled using current amount / maximum amount. Text on the left that says mana and the number displayed in the middle of the bar.

      • getCurrent

        public float getCurrent()
        Returns value of the current amount of mana.
        Returns:
        float of amount value.

      • add

        public void add(float amt)
        Adds to the current amount depending on the float value passed. If the current value + value to add is greater than the cap, the current value is set to the cap.
        Parameters:
        amt - float amount to add to current.

      • decrease

        public void decrease(float amt)
        Decreases the current amount depending on the float value passed. If the current value - value to add is less than 0, the current value is set to 0.
        Parameters:
        amt - float amount to decrease current.

      • manaSpell

        public void manaSpell()
        If the current amount - the cost of the spell is less than 0, function does nothing. Otherwise, subtracts cost from the current amount, increases cap by the multiplier and increments the upgrade counter.

      • getUpgradeCt

        public int getUpgradeCt()
        Returns the value of the upgrade count.
        Returns:
        int how many times upgraded.

      • getCost

        public float getCost()
        Returns the value of the current cost calculated by adding cost and upgrade count multiplied by increase per use amount.
        Returns:
        float value of current cost.
